name: Additive Animal Ark
description:
Submission to Trijam #67 - Theme: It's Late

It is an idle game where you have to try to get all animals before it is too late. You can spend money on the animals but will be rewarded, when you click on the animal. As soon as you gather more money, you can additionally add a manager which will click for you on a certain animal.

Additive Animal Ark is my first triple-A title :)

After having finished the prototype within the time limit, my daughter had so much fun working on the game. We therefore decided to add some details.
